mapper.select: SELECT MATCHID FROM METADATA WHERE MATCHID = #{matchId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO METADATA(DATAVERSION, MATCHID, PARTCIPANTS) VALUES(#{dataVersion}, #{matchId}, #{participants_String} )

INSERT INTO INFO(GAMEID, GAMECREATION, GAMEDURATION, GAMEENDTIMESTAMP, GAMEMODE, GAMENAME, GAMESTARTTIMESTAMP, GAMETYPE, GAMEVERSION, MAPID, PLATFORMMID, QUEUEID, TOUMAMENTCODE) VALUES(#{gameId}, #{gameCreation}, #{gameDuration}, #{gameEndTimestamp}, #{gameMode},#{gameName}, #{gameStartTimestamp},#{gameType}, #{gameVersion},#{mapId}, #{platformId}, #{queueId}, #{tournamentCode} )

INSERT INTO PARTICIPANT(GAMEID, USERPUUID, ASSISTS, BARONKILLS, BOUNTYLEVEL, CHAMPEXPERIENCE, CHAMPLEVEL, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONTRANSFORM, CONSUMABLESPURCHASED, DAMAGEDEALTTOBUILDINGS, SUMMONER2CASTS, SUMMONER2ID, SUMMONERID, SUMMONERLEVEL, SUMMONERNAME, TEAMEARLYSURRENDERED, TEAMID, TEAMPOSITION, TIMECCINGOTHERS, TIMEPLAYED, TOTALDAMAGEDEALT, TOTALDAMAGEDEALTTOCHAMPIONS, TOTALDAMAGESHIELDEDONTEAMMATES, TOTALDAMAGETAKEN, TOTALHEAL, TOTALHEALSONTEAMMATES, TOTALMINIONSKILLED, TOTALTIMECCDEALT, TOTALTIMESPENTDEAD, TOTALUNITSHEALED, TRIPLEKILLS, TRUEDAMAGEDEALT, TRUEDAMAGEDEALTTOCHAMPIONS, TRUEDAMAGETAKEN, TURRETKILLS, TURRETTAKEDOWNS, TURRETSLOST, UNREALKILLS, VISIONSCORE, VISIONWARDSBOUGHTINGAME, WARDSKILLED, WARDSPLACED, WIN ) VALUES(#{gameid}, #{userpuuid}, #{assists}, #{baronKills}, #{bountyLevel}, #{champExperience}, #{champLevel}, #{championId}, #{championName}, #{championTransform}, #{consumablesPurchased}, #{damageDealtToBuildings}, #{damageDealtToObjectives}, #{damageDealtToTurrets}, #{damageSelfMitigated}, #{deaths}, #{detectorWardsPlaced}, #{doubleKills}, #{dragonKills}, #{firstBloodAssist_int}, #{firstBloodKill_int}, #{firstTowerAssist_int}, #{firstTowerKill_int}, #{gameEndedInEarlySurrender_int}, #{gameEndedInSurrender_int}, #{goldEarned}, #{goldSpent}, #{individualPosition}, #{inhibitorKills}, #{inhibitorTakedowns}, #{inhibitorsLost}, #{item0}, #{item1}, #{item2}, #{item3}, #{item4}, #{item5}, #{item6}, #{itemsPurchased}, #{killingSprees}, #{kills}, #{lane}, #{largestCriticalStrike}, #{largestKillingSpree}, #{largestMultiKill}, #{longestTimeSpentLiving}, #{magicDamageDealt}, #{magicDamageDealtToChampions}, #{magicDamageTaken}, #{neutralMinionsKilled}, #{nexusKills}, #{nexusTakedowns}, #{nexusLost}, #{objectivesStolen}, #{objectivesStolenAssists}, #{participantId}, #{pentaKills}, #{physicalDamageDealt}, #{physicalDamageDealtToChampions}, #{physicalDamageTaken}, #{profileIcon}, #{puuid}, #{quadraKills}, #{riotIdName}, #{riotIdTagline}, #{role}, #{sightWardsBoughtInGame}, #{spell1Casts}, #{spell2Casts}, #{spell3Casts}, #{spell4Casts}, #{summoner1Casts}, #{summoner1Id}, #{summoner2Casts}, #{summoner2Id}, #{summonerId}, #{summonerLevel}, #{summonerName}, #{teamEarlySurrendered_int}, #{teamId}, #{teamPosition}, #{timeCCingOthers}, #{timePlayed}, #{totalDamageDealt}, #{totalDamageDealtToChampions}, #{totalDamageShieldedOnTeammates}, #{totalDamageTaken}, #{totalHeal}, #{totalHealsOnTeammates}, #{totalMinionsKilled}, #{totalTimeCCDealt}, #{totalTimeSpentDead}, #{totalUnitsHealed}, #{tripleKills}, #{trueDamageDealt}, #{trueDamageDealtToChampions}, #{trueDamageTaken}, #{turretKills}, #{turretTakedowns}, #{turretsLost}, #{unrealKills}, #{visionScore}, #{visionWardsBoughtInGame}, #{wardsKilled}, #{wardsPlaced}, #{win_int} )
INSERT INTO PERKSTATS(PUUID, GAMEID, DEFENSE, FLEX, OFFENSE ) VALUES(#{puuid}, #{gameId}, #{defense}, #{flex}, #{offense} )
INSERT INTO PERKSTYLE(PUUID, GAMEID, DESCRIPTION, STYLE ) VALUES(#{puuid}, #{gameId}, #{description}, #{style} )
INSERT INTO PERKSTYLESELECTION(PUUID, DESCRIPTION, GAMEID, PERK, VAR1, VAR2, VAR3 ) VALUES(#{puuid}, #{description}, #{gameId}, #{perk}, #{var1}, #{var2}, #{var3} )
INSERT INTO TEAM(TEAMID, GAMEID, WIN ) VALUES(#{teamId}, #{gameId}, #{win} )
INSERT INTO BAN(TEAMID, GAMEID, PUUID, CHAMPIONID, PICKTURN ) VALUES(#{teamId}, #{gameId}, #{puuid}, #{championId}, #{pickTurn} )
INSERT INTO OBJECTIVE(TEAMID, GAMEID, PUUID, FIRST, KILLS, TYPE ) VALUES(#{teamId}, #{gameId}, #{puuid}, #{first_int}, #{kills}, #{type} )
